H.R. 2670.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
clause 1, clause 12, clause 13, and clause 14 of section 8
of article I of the Constitution.

national defense.

[Congressional Record Volume 169, Number 33 (Friday, February 17, 2023)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mrs. WAGNER:
H.R. 1105.

To reauthorize the Debbie Smith DNA Backlog Grant Program
